import { memo } from 'react' import VerifyImage from '../../images/verifyEmail.png' import Hiring from '../../images/hiring2.png' import './VerifyEmail.scss' import { HiOutlineMail } from 'react-icons/hi' import { vietnamese, english } from '../../Languages/VerifyEmail' import BackgroundAnimater from '../../Layout/BackgroundAnimater' function VerifyEmail({ languageSelected }) { let languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) const queryString = window.location.search; const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(queryString); const email = urlParams.get('email') const role = urlParams.get('role') return (
{languageList[0]}
{languageList[1]}
) } export default memo(VerifyEmail)
